channel.title: Specing + quick prayers
channel.description: I got 3 problems. 1. when i ags spec my char like goes all weird. 2. when i do quickprayer with curses, it does let me choose more then two it cancels the other one out. 3. When i use protect Mage it shows the range sign, and when i do protect range it does mage.. 3rd one i know usually how to fix, its a new type of server so, im having a little trouble. I got teamview <-- Pm me for info and skype - Downed2earth

item.title: Specing + quick prayers

item.description:

  2. when i do quickprayer with curses, it does let me choose more then two it cancels the other one out.

3rd one i know usually how to fix, its a new type of server so, im having a little trouble.
I got teamview <-- Pm me for info
and skype - Downed2earth[/quote]

  1. What base are you using
    Answers -
  2. when i ags spec my char like goes all weird. - most likely the wrong animation
  3. When i use protect Mage it shows the range sign, and when i do protect range it does mage… - edit the cache with toms cache suit
